B1 a type of plant whose leaves are used in cooking to give flavour to particular dishes or in making medicine: dried/fresh herbs Basil, oregano, thyme, and rosemary are all herbs.herbs and spices A large range of herbs and spices are used in South Asian cooking.
More examplesFewer examplesChop the herbs very finely.Add a little salt to bring out the flavour of the herbs.Liven up your meals with fresh herbs and spices.Mash the potatoes and then mix in the butter and herbs.We value herbs for their taste, but we forget that they also have medicinal properties.
